modName: Neo Slave Leia for Skyrim - CBBE
summary:
Add the Proncess Leia's slavery clothes from the movie "Star Wars-Episode VI / Return of the Jedi" for your female characters.
It is original author's edition and made for CBBE users.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Neo's Slave Leia for Skyrim[/color][/b]

Author : Neovinci aka Meister

=================================

Add the Proncess Leia's slavery clothes from the movie "Star Wars-Episode VI / Return of the Jedi" for your female characters.
It is original author's edition and made for CBBE users.

It has only female items.
If male characters wear it will appear as the elven or dwarven cuirasses.

-I made it as an armour set for CBBE.

-It has light and heavy version.

-9 basic colours and 9 floral patterned Clothes for both of armour types.

-You can create the original version.

-Light version is set as elven material and Heavy is Dwarven.

-Every types are all teperable.


There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.

I don't want the lower cloth stretched like rubber material so applied moving expression differently.

Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)


---------------------------------

Optional esp : Normal Outfit and Robes added (same colours as original Armours)

Extract it and overwright in your Data folder your game installed.

Optional Meshes : Chain removed meshes

Extract it and overwright in your Data folder your game installed.

----------------------------------


May the Force be with You.



=================================

[b][color=yellow]Locaton :[/color][/b] In a container, near by hot deck, Riverwood.(as screenshot)

[b][color=yellow]Requirement :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body (CBBE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666)
[b][color=yellow]Recommend :[/color][/b] Calientes Female Body V3

=============================================================================================

[b][color=yellow]Credit[/color][/b]

thanks to

Betheada for this wonderful land.

Caliente for nice CBBE Female Body

Blender developers

Members of 'NAVER ElderScrolls7' cafe for useful tips and tutorials

Members of 'Naver Escroll' cafe

TESNEXUS Staff membership and many Nexus friends


=============================================================================================

[b]You can do whatever with it for personal usage.
It's not free for other's Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
If You want it, Send A PM or Mail to Me.[/b]
author: Neovinci aka Meister
